Description.Text:
Position The Kristall in Diano Marina is located just 10 meters from the sea and about 400 meters from the center. In a quiet residential area.
Restaurant Treatment: HB or FB, breakfast buffet, 3 course choice menu with salad and vegetables. Appetizers once a day, 1 x welcome drink.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Facilities: swimming pool with Jacuzzi (9x4) and children's section is always open with free sun beds. Beach facilities payable locally at 1 km. Bicycles included. With charge: tennis, table tennis and mini golf 1 km, sailing and diving to 800 meters, golf 15 km. Air conditioning on request with extra charge of € 5,00 per day for a double room and € 3.00 per day for a single room.
